ayah: حمٓ
ayah_translit: ha-meem
ayah_english: Ha Meem

ayah: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ
ayah_translit: tanzilu al-kitabi mina al-lahi al-'azizi al-hakimi
ayah_english: (The) revelation (of) the Book (is) from Allah the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

ayah: مَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗىۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ عَمَّآ أُنذِرُواْ مُعۡرِضُونَ
ayah_translit: ma khalaqna al-samawati wal-arda wama baynahuma illa bil-haqi wa-ajalin musamman wa-alladhina kafaru amma undhiru mu'riduna
ayah_english: Not We created the heavens and the earth and what (is) between both of them except in truth and (for) a term appointed But those who disbelieve from what they are warned (are) turning away

ayah: مَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗىۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ عَمَّآ أُنذِرُواْ مُعۡرِضُونَ

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُم مَّا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شِرۡكٞ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِۖ ٱئۡتُونِي بِكِتَٰبٖ مِّن قَبۡلِ هَٰذَآ أَوۡ أَثَٰرَةٖ مِّنۡ عِلۡمٍ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: qul ara-aytum ma tad'una min duni al-lahi aruni madha khalaqu mina al-ardi am lahum shir'kun fi al-samawati i'tuni bikitabin min qabli hadha aw atharatin min il'min in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: Say Do you see what you call besides besides Allah Show me what they have created of the earth or for them (is) any share in the heavens Bring me a book from before this or traces of knowledge if you are truthful

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُم مَّا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شِرۡكٞ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِۖ ٱئۡتُونِي بِكِتَٰبٖ مِّن قَبۡلِ هَٰذَآ أَوۡ أَثَٰرَةٖ مِّنۡ عِلۡمٍ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

ayah_translit: qul ara-aytum ma tad'una min duni al-lahi aruni madha khalaqu mina al-ardi am lahum shir'kun fi al-samawati i'tuni bikitabin min qabli hadha aw atharatin min il'min in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: Say Do you see what you call besides besides Allah Show me what they have created of the earth or for them (is) any share in the heavens Bring me a book from before this or traces of knowledge if you are truthful

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُم مَّا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شِرۡكٞ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِۖ ٱئۡتُونِي بِكِتَٰبٖ مِّن قَبۡلِ هَٰذَآ أَوۡ أَثَٰرَةٖ مِّنۡ عِلۡمٍ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: qul ara-aytum ma tad'una min duni al-lahi aruni madha khalaqu mina al-ardi am lahum shir'kun fi al-samawati i'tuni bikitabin min qabli hadha aw atharatin min il'min in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: Say Do you see what you call besides besides Allah Show me what they have created of the earth or for them (is) any share in the heavens Bring me a book from before this or traces of knowledge if you are truthful

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُم مَّا تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شِرۡكٞ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِۖ ٱئۡتُونِي بِكِتَٰبٖ مِّن قَبۡلِ هَٰذَآ أَوۡ أَثَٰرَةٖ مِّنۡ عِلۡمٍ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: qul ara-aytum ma tad'una min duni al-lahi aruni madha khalaqu mina al-ardi am lahum shir'kun fi al-samawati i'tuni bikitabin min qabli hadha aw atharatin min il'min in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: Say Do you see what you call besides besides Allah Show me what they have created of the earth or for them (is) any share in the heavens Bring me a book from before this or traces of knowledge if you are truthful

ayah: وَمَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِمَّن يَدۡعُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَن لَّا يَسۡتَجِيبُ لَهُۥٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَهُمۡ عَن دُعَآئِهِمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ
ayah_translit: waman adallu mimman yad'u min duni al-lahi man la yastajibu lahu ila yawmi al-qiyamati wahum an du'aihim ghafiluna
ayah_english: And who (is) more astray than (he) who calls besides besides Allah who will not respond will not respond to him until (the) Day (of) Resurrection and they of their calls (are) unaware

ayah: وَمَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِمَّن يَدۡعُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَن لَّا يَسۡتَجِيبُ لَهُۥٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَهُمۡ عَن دُعَآئِهِمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ

ayah: وَإِذَا حُشِرَ ٱلنَّاسُ كَانُواْ لَهُمۡ أَعۡدَآءٗ وَكَانُواْ بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha hushira al-nasu kanu lahum a'daan wakanu bi'ibadatihim kafirina
ayah_english: And when are gathered the people they will be for them enemies and they will be of their worship deniers

ayah_translit: wa-idha hushira al-nasu kanu lahum a'daan wakanu bi'ibadatihim kafirina
ayah_english: And when are gathered the people they will be for them enemies and they will be of their worship deniers

ayah: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا بَيِّنَٰتٖ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٌ
ayah_translit: wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qala alladhina kafaru lil'haqqi lamma jaahum hadha sih'run mubinun
ayah_english: And when are recited to them Our Verses clear say those who disbelieve of the truth when it comes to them This (is) a magic clear

ayah: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَٰتُنَا بَيِّنَٰتٖ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٌ

ayah: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُۖ قُلۡ إِنِ ٱفۡتَرَيۡتُهُۥ فَلَا تَمۡلِكُونَ لِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔاۖ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تُفِيضُونَ فِيهِۚ كَفَىٰ بِهِۦ شَهِيدَۢا بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayah_translit: am yaquluna if'tarahu qul ini if'taraytuhu fala tamlikuna li mina al-lahi shayan huwa a'lamu bima tufiduna fihi kafa bihi shahidan bayni wabaynakum wahuwa al-ghafuru al-rahimu
ayah_english: Or they say He has invented it Say If I have invented it then not you have power for me against Allah anything He knows best of what you utter concerning it Sufficient is He Sufficient is He (as) a Witness between me and between you and He (is) the Oft-Forgiving the Most Merciful

ayah_english: Or they say He has invented it Say If I have invented it then not you have power for me against Allah anything He knows best of what you utter concerning it Sufficient is He Sufficient is He (as) a Witness between me and between you and He (is) the Oft-Forgiving the Most Merciful

ayah: قُلۡ مَا كُنتُ بِدۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلرُّسُلِ وَمَآ أَدۡرِي مَا يُفۡعَلُ بِي وَلَا بِكُمۡۖ إِنۡ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayah_translit: qul ma kuntu bid'an mina al-rusuli wama adri ma yuf'alu bi wala bikum in attabi'u illa ma yuha ilayya wama ana illa nadhirun mubinun
ayah_english: Say Not I am a new (one) among the Messengers and not I know what will be done with me and not with you Not I follow but what is revealed to me and not I am but a warner clear

ayah: قُلۡ مَا كُنتُ بِدۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلرُّسُلِ وَمَآ أَدۡرِي مَا يُفۡعَلُ بِي وَلَا بِكُمۡۖ إِنۡ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

ayah_english: Say Not I am a new (one) among the Messengers and not I know what will be done with me and not with you Not I follow but what is revealed to me and not I am but a warner clear

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَفَرۡتُم بِهِۦ وَشَهِدَ شَاهِدٞ مِّنۢ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ عَلَىٰ مِثۡلِهِۦ فَـَٔامَنَ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: qul ara-aytum in kana min indi al-lahi wakafartum bihi washahida shahidun min bani is'raila ala mith'lihi faamana wa-is'takbartum inna al-laha la yahdi al-qawma al-zalimina
ayah_english: Say Do you see if it is from Allah from Allah from Allah and you disbelieve in it and testifies a witness from (the) Children of Israel (the) Children of Israel to (the) like thereof then he believed while you are arrogant Indeed Allah (does) not guide the people the wrongdoers

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَفَرۡتُم بِهِۦ وَشَهِدَ شَاهِدٞ مِّنۢ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ عَلَىٰ مِثۡلِهِۦ فَـَٔامَنَ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

ayah_english: Say Do you see if it is from Allah from Allah from Allah and you disbelieve in it and testifies a witness from (the) Children of Israel (the) Children of Israel to (the) like thereof then he believed while you are arrogant Indeed Allah (does) not guide the people the wrongdoers

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَوۡ كَانَ خَيۡرٗا مَّا سَبَقُونَآ إِلَيۡهِۚ وَإِذۡ لَمۡ يَهۡتَدُواْ بِهِۦ فَسَيَقُولُونَ هَٰذَآ إِفۡكٞ قَدِيمٞ
ayah_translit: waqala alladhina kafaru lilladhina amanu law kana khayran ma sabaquna ilayhi wa-idh lam yahtadu bihi fasayaquluna hadha if'kun qadimun
ayah_english: And say those who disbelieve of those who believe If it had been good not they (would) have preceded us to it And when not they (are) guided by it they say This (is) a lie ancient

ayah: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَوۡ كَانَ خَيۡرٗا مَّا سَبَقُونَآ إِلَيۡهِۚ وَإِذۡ لَمۡ يَهۡتَدُواْ بِهِۦ فَسَيَقُولُونَ هَٰذَآ إِفۡكٞ قَدِيمٞ

ayah: وَمِن قَبۡلِهِۦ كِتَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِمَامٗا وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَهَٰذَا كِتَٰبٞ مُّصَدِّقٞ لِّسَانًا عَرَبِيّٗا لِّيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ وَبُشۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wamin qablihi kitabu musa imaman warahmatan wahadha kitabun musaddiqun lisanan arabiyyan liyundhira alladhina zalamu wabush'ra lil'muh'sinina
ayah_english: And before it And before it (was the) Scripture (of) Musa (as) a guide and a mercy And this (is) a Book confirming (in) language Arabic to warn those who do wrong and (as) a glad tidings for the good-doers

ayah_english: And before it And before it (was the) Scripture (of) Musa (as) a guide and a mercy And this (is) a Book confirming (in) language Arabic to warn those who do wrong and (as) a glad tidings for the good-doers

ayah: وَمِن قَبۡلِهِۦ كِتَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِمَامٗا وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَهَٰذَا كِتَٰبٞ مُّصَدِّقٞ لِّسَانًا عَرَبِيّٗا لِّيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ وَبُشۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

ayah_english: And before it And before it (was the) Scripture (of) Musa (as) a guide and a mercy And this (is) a Book confirming (in) language Arabic to warn those who do wrong and (as) a glad tidings for the good-doers

ayah: وَمِن قَبۡلِهِۦ كِتَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِمَامٗا وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَهَٰذَا كِتَٰبٞ مُّصَدِّقٞ لِّسَانًا عَرَبِيّٗا لِّيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ وَبُشۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina qalu rabbuna al-lahu thumma is'taqamu fala khawfun alayhim wala hum yahzanuna
ayah_english: Indeed those who say Our Lord (is) Allah then remain firm then no fear on them and nor they will grieve

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: ulaika ashabu al-janati khalidina fiha jazaan bima kanu ya'maluna
ayah_english: Those (are the) companions (of) Paradise abiding forever therein a reward for what they used (to) do

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: وَوَصَّيۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ إِحۡسَٰنًاۖ حَمَلَتۡهُ أُمُّهُۥ كُرۡهٗا وَوَضَعَتۡهُ كُرۡهٗاۖ وَحَمۡلُهُۥ وَفِصَٰلُهُۥ ثَلَٰثُونَ شَهۡرًاۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَبَلَغَ أَرۡبَعِينَ سَنَةٗ قَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡنِيٓ أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَيَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَٰلِحٗا تَرۡضَىٰهُ وَأَصۡلِحۡ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِيٓۖ إِنِّي تُبۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِنِّي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wawassayna al-insana biwalidayhi ih'sanan hamalathu ummuhu kur'han wawada'athu kur'han wahamluhu wafisaluhu thalathuna shahran hatta idha balagha ashuddahu wabalagha arba'ina sanatan qala rabbi awzi'ni an ashkura ni'mataka allati an'amta alayya wa'ala walidayya wa-an a'mala salihan tardahu wa-aslih li fi dhurriyyati inni tub'tu ilayka wa-inni mina al-mus'limina
ayah_english: And We have enjoined (on) man to his parents kindness Carried him his mother (with) hardship and gave birth to him (with) hardship And (the) bearing of him and (the) weaning of him (is) thirty month(s) until when he reaches his maturity and reaches forty year(s) he says My Lord grant me (the) power that I may be grateful (for) Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and that I do righteous (deeds) which please You and make righteous for me among my offspring indeed I turn to You and indeed I am of those who submit

ayah: وَوَصَّيۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ إِحۡسَٰنًاۖ حَمَلَتۡهُ أُمُّهُۥ كُرۡهٗا وَوَضَعَتۡهُ كُرۡهٗاۖ وَحَمۡلُهُۥ وَفِصَٰلُهُۥ ثَلَٰثُونَ شَهۡرًاۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَبَلَغَ أَرۡبَعِينَ سَنَةٗ قَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡنِيٓ أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَيَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَٰلِحٗا تَرۡضَىٰهُ وَأَصۡلِحۡ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِيٓۖ إِنِّي تُبۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِنِّي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

ayah: وَوَصَّيۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ إِحۡسَٰنًاۖ حَمَلَتۡهُ أُمُّهُۥ كُرۡهٗا وَوَضَعَتۡهُ كُرۡهٗاۖ وَحَمۡلُهُۥ وَفِصَٰلُهُۥ ثَلَٰثُونَ شَهۡرًاۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَبَلَغَ أَرۡبَعِينَ سَنَةٗ قَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡنِيٓ أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَيَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَٰلِحٗا تَرۡضَىٰهُ وَأَصۡلِحۡ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِيٓۖ إِنِّي تُبۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِنِّي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wawassayna al-insana biwalidayhi ih'sanan hamalathu ummuhu kur'han wawada'athu kur'han wahamluhu wafisaluhu thalathuna shahran hatta idha balagha ashuddahu wabalagha arba'ina sanatan qala rabbi awzi'ni an ashkura ni'mataka allati an'amta alayya wa'ala walidayya wa-an a'mala salihan tardahu wa-aslih li fi dhurriyyati inni tub'tu ilayka wa-inni mina al-mus'limina
ayah_english: And We have enjoined (on) man to his parents kindness Carried him his mother (with) hardship and gave birth to him (with) hardship And (the) bearing of him and (the) weaning of him (is) thirty month(s) until when he reaches his maturity and reaches forty year(s) he says My Lord grant me (the) power that I may be grateful (for) Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and that I do righteous (deeds) which please You and make righteous for me among my offspring indeed I turn to You and indeed I am of those who submit

ayah: وَوَصَّيۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ إِحۡسَٰنًاۖ حَمَلَتۡهُ أُمُّهُۥ كُرۡهٗا وَوَضَعَتۡهُ كُرۡهٗاۖ وَحَمۡلُهُۥ وَفِصَٰلُهُۥ ثَلَٰثُونَ شَهۡرًاۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَبَلَغَ أَرۡبَعِينَ سَنَةٗ قَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡنِيٓ أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَيَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَٰلِحٗا تَرۡضَىٰهُ وَأَصۡلِحۡ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِيٓۖ إِنِّي تُبۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِنِّي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

ayah: وَوَصَّيۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ إِحۡسَٰنًاۖ حَمَلَتۡهُ أُمُّهُۥ كُرۡهٗا وَوَضَعَتۡهُ كُرۡهٗاۖ وَحَمۡلُهُۥ وَفِصَٰلُهُۥ ثَلَٰثُونَ شَهۡرًاۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَبَلَغَ أَرۡبَعِينَ سَنَةٗ قَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡنِيٓ أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَيَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَٰلِحٗا تَرۡضَىٰهُ وَأَصۡلِحۡ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِيٓۖ إِنِّي تُبۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِنِّي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

ayah_english: And We have enjoined (on) man to his parents kindness Carried him his mother (with) hardship and gave birth to him (with) hardship And (the) bearing of him and (the) weaning of him (is) thirty month(s) until when he reaches his maturity and reaches forty year(s) he says My Lord grant me (the) power that I may be grateful (for) Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and that I do righteous (deeds) which please You and make righteous for me among my offspring indeed I turn to You and indeed I am of those who submit

ayah: وَوَصَّيۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ إِحۡسَٰنًاۖ حَمَلَتۡهُ أُمُّهُۥ كُرۡهٗا وَوَضَعَتۡهُ كُرۡهٗاۖ وَحَمۡلُهُۥ وَفِصَٰلُهُۥ ثَلَٰثُونَ شَهۡرًاۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَبَلَغَ أَرۡبَعِينَ سَنَةٗ قَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡنِيٓ أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَيَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَٰلِحٗا تَرۡضَىٰهُ وَأَصۡلِحۡ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِيٓۖ إِنِّي تُبۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِنِّي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

ayah: وَوَصَّيۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ إِحۡسَٰنًاۖ حَمَلَتۡهُ أُمُّهُۥ كُرۡهٗا وَوَضَعَتۡهُ كُرۡهٗاۖ وَحَمۡلُهُۥ وَفِصَٰلُهُۥ ثَلَٰثُونَ شَهۡرًاۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَبَلَغَ أَرۡبَعِينَ سَنَةٗ قَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡنِيٓ أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَيَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَٰلِحٗا تَرۡضَىٰهُ وَأَصۡلِحۡ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِيٓۖ إِنِّي تُبۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِنِّي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

ayah_english: And We have enjoined (on) man to his parents kindness Carried him his mother (with) hardship and gave birth to him (with) hardship And (the) bearing of him and (the) weaning of him (is) thirty month(s) until when he reaches his maturity and reaches forty year(s) he says My Lord grant me (the) power that I may be grateful (for) Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and that I do righteous (deeds) which please You and make righteous for me among my offspring indeed I turn to You and indeed I am of those who submit

ayah: وَوَصَّيۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ إِحۡسَٰنًاۖ حَمَلَتۡهُ أُمُّهُۥ كُرۡهٗا وَوَضَعَتۡهُ كُرۡهٗاۖ وَحَمۡلُهُۥ وَفِصَٰلُهُۥ ثَلَٰثُونَ شَهۡرًاۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَبَلَغَ أَرۡبَعِينَ سَنَةٗ قَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡنِيٓ أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَيَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَٰلِحٗا تَرۡضَىٰهُ وَأَصۡلِحۡ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِيٓۖ إِنِّي تُبۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِنِّي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ نَتَقَبَّلُ عَنۡهُمۡ أَحۡسَنَ مَا عَمِلُواْ وَنَتَجَاوَزُ عَن سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ فِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ وَعۡدَ ٱلصِّدۡقِ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يُوعَدُونَ
ayah_translit: ulaika alladhina nataqabbalu anhum ahsana ma amilu wanatajawazu an sayyiatihim fi ashabi al-janati wa'da al-sid'qi alladhi kanu yu'aduna
ayah_english: Those (are) the ones We will accept from them (the) best (of) what they did and We will overlook from their evil deeds among (the) companions (of) Paradise A promise true which they were promised

ayah_translit: ulaika alladhina nataqabbalu anhum ahsana ma amilu wanatajawazu an sayyiatihim fi ashabi al-janati wa'da al-sid'qi alladhi kanu yu'aduna
ayah_english: Those (are) the ones We will accept from them (the) best (of) what they did and We will overlook from their evil deeds among (the) companions (of) Paradise A promise true which they were promised

ayah: وَٱلَّذِي قَالَ لِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ أُفّٖ لَّكُمَآ أَتَعِدَانِنِيٓ أَنۡ أُخۡرَجَ وَقَدۡ خَلَتِ ٱلۡقُرُونُ مِن قَبۡلِي وَهُمَا يَسۡتَغِيثَانِ ٱللَّهَ وَيۡلَكَ ءَامِنۡ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ فَيَقُولُ مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhi qala liwalidayhi uffin lakuma ata'idanini an ukh'raja waqad khalati al-qurunu min qabli wahuma yastaghithani al-laha waylaka amin inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun fayaqulu ma hadha illa asatiru al-awalina
ayah_english: But the one who says to his parents Uff to both of you Do you promise me that I will be brought forth and have already passed away and have already passed away the generations before me before me And they both seek help (of) Allah Woe to you Believe Indeed (the) Promise (of) Allah (is) true But he says Not (is) this but (the) stories (of) the former (people)

ayah: وَٱلَّذِي قَالَ لِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ أُفّٖ لَّكُمَآ أَتَعِدَانِنِيٓ أَنۡ أُخۡرَجَ وَقَدۡ خَلَتِ ٱلۡقُرُونُ مِن قَبۡلِي وَهُمَا يَسۡتَغِيثَانِ ٱللَّهَ وَيۡلَكَ ءَامِنۡ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ فَيَقُولُ مَا هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ فِيٓ أُمَمٖ قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ خَٰسِرِينَ
ayah_translit: ulaika alladhina haqqa alayhimu al-qawlu fi umamin qad khalat min qablihim mina al-jini wal-insi innahum kanu khasirina
ayah_english: Those (are) the ones (has) proved true against them the word among nations (that) already passed away (that) already passed away before them before them of (the) jinn and the men Indeed, they are (the) losers

ayah: وَلِكُلّٖ دَرَجَٰتٞ مِّمَّا عَمِلُواْۖ وَلِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: walikullin darajatun mimma amilu waliyuwaffiyahum a'malahum wahum la yuz'lamuna
ayah_english: And for all (are) degrees for what they did and that He may fully compensate them (for) their deeds and they will not be wronged will not be wronged

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يُعۡرَضُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ أَذۡهَبۡتُمۡ طَيِّبَٰتِكُمۡ فِي حَيَاتِكُمُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱسۡتَمۡتَعۡتُم بِهَا فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَوۡنَ عَذَابَ ٱلۡهُونِ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَفۡسُقُونَ
ayah_translit: wayawma yu'radu alladhina kafaru ala al-nari adhhabtum tayyibatikum fi hayatikumu al-dun'ya wa-is'tamta'tum biha fal-yawma tuj'zawna adhaba al-huni bima kuntum tastakbiruna fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi wabima kuntum tafsuquna
ayah_english: And (the) Day will be exposed those who disbelieved to the Fire You exhausted your good things in your life (of) the world and you took your pleasures therein So today you will be recompensed (with) a punishment humiliating because you were arrogant in the earth without [the] right and because you were defiantly disobedient

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يُعۡرَضُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ أَذۡهَبۡتُمۡ طَيِّبَٰتِكُمۡ فِي حَيَاتِكُمُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱسۡتَمۡتَعۡتُم بِهَا فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَوۡنَ عَذَابَ ٱلۡهُونِ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَفۡسُقُونَ

ayah_english: And (the) Day will be exposed those who disbelieved to the Fire You exhausted your good things in your life (of) the world and you took your pleasures therein So today you will be recompensed (with) a punishment humiliating because you were arrogant in the earth without [the] right and because you were defiantly disobedient

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يُعۡرَضُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ أَذۡهَبۡتُمۡ طَيِّبَٰتِكُمۡ فِي حَيَاتِكُمُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱسۡتَمۡتَعۡتُم بِهَا فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَوۡنَ عَذَابَ ٱلۡهُونِ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَفۡسُقُونَ

ayah: ۞وَٱذۡكُرۡ أَخَا عَادٍ إِذۡ أَنذَرَ قَوۡمَهُۥ بِٱلۡأَحۡقَافِ وَقَدۡ خَلَتِ ٱلنُّذُرُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦٓ أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
ayah_translit: wa-udh'kur akha adin idh andhara qawmahu bil-ahqafi waqad khalati al-nudhuru min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi alla ta'budu illa al-laha inni akhafu alaykum adhaba yawmin azimin
ayah_english: And mention (the) brother (of) Aad when he warned his people in the Al-Ahqaf and had already passed away and had already passed away [the] warners before him before him before him and after him and after him That not you worship except Allah Indeed, I [I] fear for you a punishment (of) a Day Great

ayah: ۞وَٱذۡكُرۡ أَخَا عَادٍ إِذۡ أَنذَرَ قَوۡمَهُۥ بِٱلۡأَحۡقَافِ وَقَدۡ خَلَتِ ٱلنُّذُرُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦٓ أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتَأۡفِكَنَا عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu aji'tana litafikana an alihatina fatina bima ta'iduna in kunta mina al-sadiqina
ayah_english: They said Have you come to us to turn us away from our gods Then bring us what you threaten us if you are of the truthful

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتَأۡفِكَنَا عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu aji'tana litafikana an alihatina fatina bima ta'iduna in kunta mina al-sadiqina

ayah: قَالَ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَأُبَلِّغُكُم مَّآ أُرۡسِلۡتُ بِهِۦ وَلَٰكِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰكُمۡ قَوۡمٗا تَجۡهَلُونَ
ayah_translit: qala innama al-'il'mu inda al-lahi wa-uballighukum ma ur'sil'tu bihi walakinni arakum qawman tajhaluna
ayah_english: He said Only the knowledge (is) with Allah (is) with Allah and I convey to you what I am sent with it but I see you a people ignorant

ayah: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡهُ عَارِضٗا مُّسۡتَقۡبِلَ أَوۡدِيَتِهِمۡ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا عَارِضٞ مُّمۡطِرُنَاۚ بَلۡ هُوَ مَا ٱسۡتَعۡجَلۡتُم بِهِۦۖ رِيحٞ فِيهَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: falamma ra-awhu aridan mus'taqbila awdiyatihim qalu hadha aridun mum'tiruna bal huwa ma is'ta'jaltum bihi rihun fiha adhabun alimun
ayah_english: Then when they saw it (as) a cloud approaching their valleys they said This (is) a cloud bringing us rain Nay it (is) what you were asking it to be hastened you were asking it to be hastened a wind in it (is) a punishment painful

ayah: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡهُ عَارِضٗا مُّسۡتَقۡبِلَ أَوۡدِيَتِهِمۡ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا عَارِضٞ مُّمۡطِرُنَاۚ بَلۡ هُوَ مَا ٱسۡتَعۡجَلۡتُم بِهِۦۖ رِيحٞ فِيهَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: falamma ra-awhu aridan mus'taqbila awdiyatihim qalu hadha aridun mum'tiruna bal huwa ma is'ta'jaltum bihi rihun fiha adhabun alimun

ayah: تُدَمِّرُ كُلَّ شَيۡءِۭ بِأَمۡرِ رَبِّهَا فَأَصۡبَحُواْ لَا يُرَىٰٓ إِلَّا مَسَٰكِنُهُمۡۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
ayah_translit: tudammiru kulla shayin bi-amri rabbiha fa-asbahu la yura illa masakinuhum kadhalika najzi al-qawma al-muj'rimina
ayah_english: Destroying every thing by (the) command (of) its Lord Then they became (such) not is seen except their dwellings Thus We recompense the people [the] criminals

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ مَكَّنَّـٰهُمۡ فِيمَآ إِن مَّكَّنَّـٰكُمۡ فِيهِ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَهُمۡ سَمۡعٗا وَأَبۡصَٰرٗا وَأَفۡـِٔدَةٗ فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ سَمۡعُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَفۡـِٔدَتُهُم مِّن شَيۡءٍ إِذۡ كَانُواْ يَجۡحَدُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad makkannahum fima in makkannakum fihi waja'alna lahum sam'an wa-absaran wa-afidatan fama aghna anhum sam'uhum wala absaruhum wala afidatuhum min shayin idh kanu yajhaduna biayati al-lahi wahaqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
ayah_english: And certainly We had established them in what not We have established you in it and We made for them hearing and vision and hearts But not availed them their hearing and not their vision and not their hearts any thing when they were rejecting (the) Signs (of) Allah and enveloped them what they used (to) [at it] ridicule

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ مَكَّنَّـٰهُمۡ فِيمَآ إِن مَّكَّنَّـٰكُمۡ فِيهِ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَهُمۡ سَمۡعٗا وَأَبۡصَٰرٗا وَأَفۡـِٔدَةٗ فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ سَمۡعُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَفۡـِٔدَتُهُم مِّن شَيۡءٍ إِذۡ كَانُواْ يَجۡحَدُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ مَكَّنَّـٰهُمۡ فِيمَآ إِن مَّكَّنَّـٰكُمۡ فِيهِ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَهُمۡ سَمۡعٗا وَأَبۡصَٰرٗا وَأَفۡـِٔدَةٗ فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ سَمۡعُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَفۡـِٔدَتُهُم مِّن شَيۡءٍ إِذۡ كَانُواْ يَجۡحَدُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

ayah_english: And certainly We had established them in what not We have established you in it and We made for them hearing and vision and hearts But not availed them their hearing and not their vision and not their hearts any thing when they were rejecting (the) Signs (of) Allah and enveloped them what they used (to) [at it] ridicule

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ مَكَّنَّـٰهُمۡ فِيمَآ إِن مَّكَّنَّـٰكُمۡ فِيهِ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَهُمۡ سَمۡعٗا وَأَبۡصَٰرٗا وَأَفۡـِٔدَةٗ فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ سَمۡعُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَفۡـِٔدَتُهُم مِّن شَيۡءٍ إِذۡ كَانُواْ يَجۡحَدُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مَا حَوۡلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَصَرَّفۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad ahlakna ma hawlakum mina al-qura wasarrafna al-ayati la'allahum yarji'una
ayah_english: And certainly We destroyed what surrounds you of the towns and We have diversified the Signs that they may return

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مَا حَوۡلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَصَرَّفۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: walaqad ahlakna ma hawlakum mina al-qura wasarrafna al-ayati la'allahum yarji'una
ayah_english: And certainly We destroyed what surrounds you of the towns and We have diversified the Signs that they may return

ayah_translit: walaqad ahlakna ma hawlakum mina al-qura wasarrafna al-ayati la'allahum yarji'una
ayah_english: And certainly We destroyed what surrounds you of the towns and We have diversified the Signs that they may return

ayah: فَلَوۡلَا نَصَرَهُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ قُرۡبَانًا ءَالِهَةَۢۖ بَلۡ ضَلُّواْ عَنۡهُمۡۚ وَذَٰلِكَ إِفۡكُهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
ayah_translit: falawla nasarahumu alladhina ittakhadhu min duni al-lahi qur'banan alihatan bal dallu anhum wadhalika if'kuhum wama kanu yaftaruna
ayah_english: Then why (did) not help them those whom they had taken besides besides Allah gods as a way of approach gods as a way of approach Nay they were lost from them And that (was) their falsehood and what they were inventing

ayah: وَإِذۡ صَرَفۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ نَفَرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ فَلَمَّا حَضَرُوهُ قَالُوٓاْ أَنصِتُواْۖ فَلَمَّا قُضِيَ وَلَّوۡاْ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِم مُّنذِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-idh sarafna ilayka nafaran mina al-jini yastami'una al-qur'ana falamma hadaruhu qalu ansitu falamma qudiya wallaw ila qawmihim mundhirina
ayah_english: And when We directed to you a party of the jinn listening (to) the Quran And when they attended it they said Listen quietly And when it was concluded they turned back to their people (as) warners

ayah_translit: wa-idh sarafna ilayka nafaran mina al-jini yastami'una al-qur'ana falamma hadaruhu qalu ansitu falamma qudiya wallaw ila qawmihim mundhirina

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰقَوۡمَنَآ إِنَّا سَمِعۡنَا كِتَٰبًا أُنزِلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مُوسَىٰ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ يَهۡدِيٓ إِلَى ٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِلَىٰ طَرِيقٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
ayah_translit: qalu yaqawmana inna sami'na kitaban unzila min ba'di musa musaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi yahdi ila al-haqi wa-ila tariqin mus'taqimin
ayah_english: They said O our people Indeed, we [we] have heard a Book revealed after after Musa confirming what (was) before it (was) before it guiding to the truth and to a Path Straight

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰقَوۡمَنَآ إِنَّا سَمِعۡنَا كِتَٰبًا أُنزِلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مُوسَىٰ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ يَهۡدِيٓ إِلَى ٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِلَىٰ طَرِيقٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

ayah: يَٰقَوۡمَنَآ أَجِيبُواْ دَاعِيَ ٱللَّهِ وَءَامِنُواْ بِهِۦ يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُجِرۡكُم مِّنۡ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ
ayah_translit: yaqawmana ajibu da'iya al-lahi waaminu bihi yaghfir lakum min dhunubikum wayujir'kum min adhabin alimin
ayah_english: O our people! Respond (to the) caller (of) Allah and believe in him He will forgive for you of your sins and will protect you from a punishment painful

ayah: وَمَن لَّا يُجِبۡ دَاعِيَ ٱللَّهِ فَلَيۡسَ بِمُعۡجِزٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَيۡسَ لَهُۥ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءُۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ
ayah_translit: waman la yujib da'iya al-lahi falaysa bimu'jizin fi al-ardi walaysa lahu min dunihi awliyau ulaika fi dalalin mubinin
ayah_english: And whoever (does) not respond (to the) caller (of) Allah then not he can escape in the earth and not for him besides Him besides Him protectors Those (are) in error clear

ayah: وَمَن لَّا يُجِبۡ دَاعِيَ ٱللَّهِ فَلَيۡسَ بِمُعۡجِزٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَيۡسَ لَهُۥ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءُۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ

ayah_english: And whoever (does) not respond (to the) caller (of) Allah then not he can escape in the earth and not for him besides Him besides Him protectors Those (are) in error clear

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَلَمۡ يَعۡيَ بِخَلۡقِهِنَّ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰۚ بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
ayah_translit: awalam yaraw anna al-laha alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda walam ya'ya bikhalqihinna biqadirin ala an yuh'yiya al-mawta bala innahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: Do not they see that Allah (is) the One Who created the heavens and the earth and (did) not get tired by their creation (is) able to give life to give life to give life (to) the dead Yes indeed He (is) on every thing All-Powerful

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَلَمۡ يَعۡيَ بِخَلۡقِهِنَّ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰۚ بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَلَمۡ يَعۡيَ بِخَلۡقِهِنَّ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰۚ بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يُعۡرَضُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ أَلَيۡسَ هَٰذَا بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّنَاۚ قَالَ فَذُوقُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wayawma yu'radu alladhina kafaru ala al-nari alaysa hadha bil-haqi qalu bala warabbina qala fadhuqu al-'adhaba bima kuntum takfuruna
ayah_english: And (the) Day are exposed those who disbelieved to the Fire Is not this the truth They will say Yes by our Lord He will say Then taste the punishment because you used (to) disbelieve

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يُعۡرَضُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ أَلَيۡسَ هَٰذَا بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّنَاۚ قَالَ فَذُوقُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ

ayah_translit: wayawma yu'radu alladhina kafaru ala al-nari alaysa hadha bil-haqi qalu bala warabbina qala fadhuqu al-'adhaba bima kuntum takfuruna
ayah_english: And (the) Day are exposed those who disbelieved to the Fire Is not this the truth They will say Yes by our Lord He will say Then taste the punishment because you used (to) disbelieve

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يُعۡرَضُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ أَلَيۡسَ هَٰذَا بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّنَاۚ قَالَ فَذُوقُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wayawma yu'radu alladhina kafaru ala al-nari alaysa hadha bil-haqi qalu bala warabbina qala fadhuqu al-'adhaba bima kuntum takfuruna

ayah: فَٱصۡبِرۡ كَمَا صَبَرَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡعَزۡمِ مِنَ ٱلرُّسُلِ وَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِل لَّهُمۡۚ كَأَنَّهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ مَا يُوعَدُونَ لَمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا سَاعَةٗ مِّن نَّهَارِۭۚ بَلَٰغٞۚ فَهَلۡ يُهۡلَكُ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-is'bir kama sabara ulu al-'azmi mina al-rusuli wala tasta'jil lahum ka-annahum yawma yarawna ma yu'aduna lam yalbathu illa sa'atan min naharin balaghun fahal yuh'laku illa al-qawmu al-fasiquna
ayah_english: So be patient as had patience those of determination those of determination of the Messengers and (do) not seek to hasten for them As if they had (the) Day they see what they were promised not remained except an hour of a day A clear Message But will (any) be destroyed except the people the defiantly disobedient

ayah_translit: fa-is'bir kama sabara ulu al-'azmi mina al-rusuli wala tasta'jil lahum ka-annahum yawma yarawna ma yu'aduna lam yalbathu illa sa'atan min naharin balaghun fahal yuh'laku illa al-qawmu al-fasiquna
